post:
**`FINAL FEW SERVERS ARE BEING SOLD!`**

DediCube, LLC. was founded in early 2014. Since then, we've seen some unprecedented growth and are growing quite rapidly. To celebrate our awesome growth, we're offering a limited time promotion. For the life of your E3-1240v2/E3-1240v3, you'll pay only $**49 a month** plus any upgrades. We'll be releasing stock over the next seven days in quantities of three to five (8 - 30 servers will be sold, depending on popularity), so check back often! We'll also be Tweeting when new stock is released, so follow us on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/dedicube).

<pre>Crazy Cube
→ E3-1240v2 or E3-1240v3
→ 16 GB of RAM
→ 1 x 500 GB HDD
→ /29 IPv4
→ 10 TB on a GigE
→ Buffalo, New York with ColoCrossing
$49 a month for life</pre>

[Click Here to Order](https://dedicube.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=15)

To guarantee quick responses to your sales inquiries, please [open a ticket](https://dedicube.com/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1).
